comments.text:
I have some consistency to this, I think.

I'm presently running SM 2.7.2.7/ESR. Normally, I start the app by launching MailNews. In this manner, I consistently have scrollbar bitmaps. However, if I launch the browser first (typically, I restore a dozen or so tabs when the browser window opens), or if I install an extension and then restart (which by default starts the browser first), scrollabr bitmaps are *consistently* missing.

It feels like a shortage of some memory resource at launch time, where the greater demand of drawing the browser windows (perhaps) as opposed to starting a single tab in MailNews makes the difference.
